title: Manage Inspection Contingency
description: The buyer has completed their inspection and submitted a repair request. The TC must manage this process.

tasks.description: Receive the buyer's inspection report and repair request addendum.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the receipt of the inspection documents.

tasks.description: Send the documents to the seller's agent and confirm receipt.
tasks.expected_outcome: The documents are emailed to the listing agent.

tasks.description: Update the transaction checklist to track the deadline for the seller's response to the repair request.
tasks.expected_outcome: A task is created or updated in the transaction system with the correct deadline.
